section.title: Updating the Guest Agents and Drivers on Red Hat Enterprise Linux
section.para: Update the guest agents and drivers on your Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines to use the latest version.

procedure.title: Updating the Guest Agents and Drivers on Red Hat Enterprise Linux

step.para: Log in to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machine.

listitem.para: For Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 # service ovirt-guest-agent restart
For Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 # systemctl restart ovirt-guest-agent.service
